Monster ID4501

Brine rats are Slayer monsters that can be found in the Brine Rat Cavern near Rellekka. They are notable for being the only monsters to drop the Brine sabre. A Slayer level of 47 is required to fight them, and a spade is required to access the cavern.

They are only assigned to players who have progressed in Olaf's Quest to the point where they need to enter the Brine Rat Cavern. Additionally, they can be killed as an alternative for a rat Slayer task provided the player has the appropriate Slayer level to do so.

Brine rats have relatively low Defence, but fairly high Strength and Attack. As such, it is recommended to bring food if players do not have high (~70) Defence.

Alternatively, players can bring Bones to peaches (tablet) to convert their bones drops to peaches, which heal 8 hitpoints each. Bringing logs and a tinderbox to cook and eat the Raw rat meat and other raw fish that they drop is also an option, though this is significantly more time consuming and less efficient than using peaches.

Killing a Brine rat is a requirement for completing the medium task set in the Fremennik Diary.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Brine Rat Cavern (dks)707Maplink

Tips[edit | edit source]

Location of the brine rat safespot.
(South-east corner)
  • There are two safespots, one being the black bones to the south-east, and the other in the north-west corner of the cave. If the brine rats are in the top half of the cave, you are able to safespot them from behind the bones in the corner.
  • Brine rats frequently drop raw swordfish and occasionally drop unnoted raw sharks in addition to raw rat meat, so bringing a tinderbox and a couple of logs may be advisable. Alternatively, Olaf, outside the caverns, has a permanent fire located beside him, so players can collect the unnoted raw fish/rat meat drops and cook them on his fire if they are willing to exit and re-enter the caverns multiple times.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 128,958 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Brine rat kill is worth 1,233.89.

The average Brine rat kill while on a Konar task is worth 1,739.77.
